title: Getting started - Styling
content: Faceless UI components have no appearance and apply as little CSS as possible to achieve core functionality. To customize the appearance of Faceless UI components, use your existing CSS setup. Every Faceless UI component exposes its DOM entirely, letting you customize the markup to meet your exact needs. A typical pattern is to pass class names or style objects to these components through props. This makes it possible to tie into any CSS framework, such as CSS Modules.
